english.segment1: Softly and tenderly Jesus is calling calling for you and for me. See on the portal he's waiting and watching watching for you and for me
english.segment2: Come home come home ye who are weary come home. Earnestly tenderly Jesus is calling calling oh sinner come home
english.segment3: Oh what a wonderful love he has promised promised for you and for me. Though we have sinn'd he has mercy and pardon pardon for you and for me
